attributes.action: Ban fireworks in the suburbs, and restrict use to council- approved events.
attributes.additional_details: Restrict, by law, the setting off of fireworks in residential areas.
attributes.background: Fireworks are a hazard and pollutant and I want private/ individual consumer use banned.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Limit the Sale and Use of Fireworks to Organisers of Licensed Displays Only
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891

Stop the sale of fireworks to the general public.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557780

Ban the use of fireworks in residential areas
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559560

Require 1 week's notice be given of any use of fireworks in a residential area
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332906
